actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

official_title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that Radio Free Europe/Radio Liberty should reinstate Uighur language broadcasts to the Soviet Union.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that Radio Free Europe/Radio Liberty should: (1) reinstate its broadcasts in the Uighur language to the Soviet Union; and (2) set aside any further planned reductions of services in foreign languages.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that Radio Free Europe/Radio Liberty should reinstate Uighur language broadcasts to the Soviet Union.
